description:
The Akudarma Trio head to New York’s Yankee Stadium in 1923 to find the God of B aseball, Babe Ruth. They find Babe Ruth hitting one homerun after another, but he seemed to be troubled about if he wanted to bat or pitch. Not only was he an amazing batter, he was a great pitcher, as well. Bimajo loses her patience and decides for him, when Tokio and Calen show up. Are they going to try to settle things with a baseball battle?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What Was the Super Surprising Job That the God of Baseball, Babe Ruth, Tried to Do?!
Yakyuu no Kami Babe Ruth ga Yarou Toshite Ita Bikkuri Dokkuri na Shigoto to wa!?
野球の神ベーブ・ルースがやろうとしていたビックリドッキリな仕事とは!?
